languages.text: "Рад видеть, что всем развлечениям этого мира вы предпочитаете нашу миссию".
"I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."
languages.original_text: "Рад видеть, что всем развлечениям этого мира вы предпочитаете нашу миссию".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer our mission to all the idle pastimes of this world."
"I am pleased to see that you prefer our mission to all the idle pastimes of this world."
"I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."
"I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."
"I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."
"I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

languages.text: 「この世のくだらない娯楽よりも、私たちの任務を優先してくださるとは嬉しい限りです」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: 「この世のくだらない娯楽よりも、私たちの任務を優先してくださるとは嬉しい限りです」

languages.text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr lieber unsere Mission fortsetzt, als den vielen Freizeitvergnügungen dieser Welt zu frönen."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr lieber unsere Mission fortsetzt, als den vielen Freizeitvergnügungen dieser Welt zu frönen."

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de constater que vous donnez la priorité à notre mission plutôt qu'aux passe-temps futiles de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de constater que vous donnez la priorité à notre mission plutôt qu'aux passe-temps futiles de ce monde. »

languages.text: «Me complace ver que prefiere continuar con nuestra misión en vez de entregarse a los muchos pasatiempos que ofrece este planeta».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: «Me complace ver que prefiere continuar con nuestra misión en vez de entregarse a los muchos pasatiempos que ofrece este planeta».

languages.text: “我很高兴，你并不在意这个世界那些无聊的消遣，更在意我们的使命。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴，你并不在意这个世界那些无聊的消遣，更在意我们的使命。”

languages.text: "Görevimizi sürdürmeyi bu dünyanın bomboş eğlencelerine tercih ettiğinizi görmekten memnuniyet duydum."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to see that you prefer to continue our mission over all the idle pastimes of this world."

traits.locale_text: "Görevimizi sürdürmeyi bu dünyanın bomboş eğlencelerine tercih ettiğinizi görmekten memnuniyet duydum."
